svg.text: Core Traditional RPA (Always Available) + Optional AI Extensions (Pay-as-you-grow)
🏗️ CORE RPA FOUNDATION - No AI/GPU Required - Traditional Automation Only
🖥️ Electron Desktop App - Multi-Channel Workflow Creation
Traditional RPA Tools - No GPU Required
🚀 OPTIONAL AI EXTENSIONS - Requires GPU/Cloud - Pay-as-you-grow
Optional AI/LLM Layer - Enhanced Automation Capabilities
Optional Multi-Agent System - Specialized Bot Network
💰 FLEXIBLE PRICING TIERS - Pay Only for What You Use
Traditional RPA • No GPU • No AI
🚀 EVOLUTION PATH: Start Simple → Scale Smart → Pay as You Grow
Extensible Architecture - Never Pay for Unused Features
Start with Traditional RPA → Upgrade Only When You Need Advanced Features
✅ KEY BENEFITS - Traditional RPA Reliability + Optional AI Innovation
